intro: Clidemia ostentata, commonly known as showy false mallow, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean and parts of Central America. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often covered in fine hairs. Clidemia ostentata typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
